import discord
import asyncio
from core.bot import AegisBot

async def check_channels():
    bot = AegisBot()
    await bot.setup()
    await bot.login(bot.http.token)
    
    guild = bot.get_guild(1401296043504832602)
    if guild:
        print(''Canaux disponibles:'')
        for channel in guild.channels:
            print(f''- {channel.name} (ID: {channel.id}) - Type: {type(channel).__name__}'')
    
    await bot.close()

# Récupérer le token depuis la config
from config.bot_config import bot_settings
import os
os.environ[''DISCORD_TOKEN''] = bot_settings.token

asyncio.run(check_channels())
")

Bash("C:/Users/FATON-GAMES/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python311/python.exe" -c "
import asyncio
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''.'')

from database.supabase_client import supabase_client

async def test_connection():
    print(''Test de connexion Supabase...'')
    connected = await supabase_client.connect()
    
    if connected:
        print(''✅ Connexion réussie!'')
        
        # Test d''une fonction de base  
        try:
            stats = await supabase_client.get_guild_stats(123456789)
            print(f''Stats test: {stats}'')
        except Exception as e:
            print(f''Erreur test stats: {e}'')
            
        # Test fonction flags récents
        try:
            flags = await supabase_client.get_recent_flags()
            print(f''Flags récents: {len(flags)} trouvés'')
        except Exception as e:
            print(f''Erreur test flags: {e}'')
    else:
        print(''❌ Échec de connexion'')

asyncio.run(test_connection())
")

Bash("C:/Users/FATON-GAMES/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python311/python.exe" -c "
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
from supabase import create_client

load_dotenv()

supabase_url = os.getenv(''SUPABASE_URL'')
supabase_key = os.getenv(''SUPABASE_KEY'')

print(''Test connexion base de donnees Supabase...'')

try:
    client = create_client(supabase_url, supabase_key)
    
    # Test tables existantes
    tables = [''user_flags'', ''access_logs'', ''flagged_users'', ''query_logs'']
    
    for table in tables:
        try:
            result = client.table(table).select(''id'').limit(1).execute()
            print(f''Table {table}: OK'')
        except Exception as e:
            print(f''Table {table}: MANQUANTE - {str(e)[:50]}...'')
            
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erreur connexion: {e}'')
")
